Name: Takashi Kurita
Details:
Born 2970.

The current Coordinator of the Draconis Combine, Takashi rose to power after this father Hohiro was murdered by one of his Otomo bodyguards. After rumors surfaced of his involvement in the assassination, Takashi had all dissidents rounded up and executed in a bloody purge, followed by a series of attempts on the Coordinator's life. Takashi has a single son, Theodore who was recently named his heir, despite rumors of both being personally estranged from one another.
